name: Eru
description: A traditional Cameroonian stew made from eru leaves (Gnetum africanum), cooked with meat or fish and palm oil. It's a flavorful vegetable dish.
recipe: Cook the meat or fish with onions, garlic, and a bit of water to make broth.
Add the pounded or chopped eru leaves and palm oil.
Simmer for 20-30 minutes until the leaves are tender and the flavors meld.
Season with salt and chili peppers to taste.
Serve hot with fufu or rice.
